summary: The module implements fast linear and multilinear interpolation on regular 1‑, 2‑ and 3‑dimensional grids, specially handling NaN nodata values by using an accumulator/divisor strategy. It computes per‑dimension weights and source indices, applies the appropriate interpolation routine, and provides Numba‑accelerated closures to be used by higher‑level regridding code.
business_intent: Provide a robust, high‑performance interpolation engine for scientific and geospatial datasets, enabling accurate regridding while correctly propagating missing data flags.
